code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Field from'./components/Field';import PlayerModal from'./components/PlayerModal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[selectedPlayer,setSelectedPlayer]=useState(null);const[playerActions,setPlayerActions]=useState({'Player 1':{goal:0,assist:0,foul:0},'Player 2':{goal:0,assist:0,foul:0},'Player 3':{goal:0,assist:0,foul:0},'Goalkeeper':{goal:0,assist:0,foul:0}});const openModal=player=>{setSelectedPlayer(player);};const closeModal=()=>{setSelectedPlayer(null);};const recordAction=actionType=>{if(selectedPlayer){setPlayerActions(prevActions=>({...prevActions,[selectedPlayer]:{...prevActions[selectedPlayer],[actionType]:prevActions[selectedPlayer][actionType]+1}}));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Soccer Match Tracker"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Field,{onPlayerClick:openModal,playerActions:playerActions}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayerModal,{player:selectedPlayer,onClose:closeModal,onRecordAction:recordAction})]});};export default App;
